content: @ Bob Milius , there are some discussion items arising out of the "implementation guide" that might be good to cover in Montreal. How can I suggest these? Thanks.

@Gaston Fiore @Gil Alterovitz Gil will be presiding co-chair for the FHIR sessions (Mon Q4, Wed Q3 & Q4) so I'd email him about putting them on the agendas, and probably good to cc to the listserv too
Thanks @ Bob Milius . I'll email Gil and cc the CG WG listserv as well.
